targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  DATE_TRUNC('hour', NOW()) - INTERVAL '24 HOURS' AS time,
  start_candles.venue || ':' || start_candles.product AS text,
  (end_candles.close - start_candles.open) / start_candles.open * 100 AS price_change_pct
FROM (
    SELECT
      ranked_candles.time,
      ranked_candles.venue,
      ranked_candles.product,
      ranked_candles.open,
      ranked_candles.candle_rank
    FROM (
      SELECT
        candles.time,
        candles.venue,
        candles.product,
        candles.open,
        dense_rank() OVER (
          PARTITION BY candles.venue, candles.product
          ORDER BY candles.time ASC
        ) as candle_rank
      FROM candles
        LEFT JOIN products ON products.venue = candles.venue AND products.symbol = candles.product
      WHERE
        candles.time >= DATE_TRUNC('hour', NOW()) - INTERVAL '24 HOURS'
        AND products.type IN ($type)
      ORDER BY
        candles.venue,
        candles.product,
        candles.time
      ) AS ranked_candles
    WHERE ranked_candles.candle_rank = 1
  ) AS start_candles
  LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT
      ranked_candles.time,
      ranked_candles.venue,
      ranked_candles.product,
      ranked_candles.close,
      ranked_candles.candle_rank
    FROM (
      SELECT
        candles.time,
        candles.venue,
        candles.product,
        candles.close,
        dense_rank() OVER (
          PARTITION BY candles.venue, candles.product
          ORDER BY candles.time DESC
        ) as candle_rank
      FROM candles
        LEFT JOIN products ON products.venue = candles.venue AND products.symbol = candles.product
      WHERE
        candles.time >= DATE_TRUNC('hour', NOW()) - INTERVAL '24 HOURS'
        AND candles.time <= DATE_TRUNC('hour', NOW())
        AND products.type IN ($type)
      ORDER BY
        candles.venue,
        candles.product,
        candles.time
      ) AS ranked_candles
    WHERE ranked_candles.candle_rank = 1
  ) AS end_candles ON end_candles.venue = start_candles.venue AND end_candles.product = start_candles.product
ORDER BY
  price_change_pct ASC

SELECT
  DATE_TRUNC('hour', NOW()) - INTERVAL '168 HOURS' AS time,
  start_candles.venue || ':' || start_candles.product AS text,
  (end_candles.close - start_candles.open) / start_candles.open * 100 AS price_change_pct
FROM (
    SELECT
      ranked_candles.time,
      ranked_candles.venue,
      ranked_candles.product,
      ranked_candles.open,
      ranked_candles.candle_rank
    FROM (
      SELECT
        candles.time,
        candles.venue,
        candles.product,
        candles.open,
        dense_rank() OVER (
          PARTITION BY candles.venue, candles.product
          ORDER BY candles.time ASC
        ) as candle_rank
      FROM candles
        LEFT JOIN products ON products.venue = candles.venue AND products.symbol = candles.product
      WHERE
        candles.time >= DATE_TRUNC('hour', NOW()) - INTERVAL '168 HOURS'
        AND products.type IN ($type)
      ORDER BY
        candles.venue,
        candles.product,
        candles.time
      ) AS ranked_candles
    WHERE ranked_candles.candle_rank = 1
  ) AS start_candles
  LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT
      ranked_candles.time,
      ranked_candles.venue,
      ranked_candles.product,
      ranked_candles.close,
      ranked_candles.candle_rank
    FROM (
      SELECT
        candles.time,
        candles.venue,
        candles.product,
        candles.close,
        dense_rank() OVER (
          PARTITION BY candles.venue, candles.product
          ORDER BY candles.time DESC
        ) as candle_rank
      FROM candles
        LEFT JOIN products ON products.venue = candles.venue AND products.symbol = candles.product
      WHERE
        candles.time >= DATE_TRUNC('hour', NOW()) - INTERVAL '168 HOURS'
        AND candles.time <= DATE_TRUNC('hour', NOW())
        AND products.type IN ($type)
      ORDER BY
        candles.venue,
        candles.product,
        candles.time
      ) AS ranked_candles
    WHERE ranked_candles.candle_rank = 1
  ) AS end_candles ON end_candles.venue = start_candles.venue AND end_candles.product = start_candles.product
ORDER BY
  price_change_pct ASC

list.definition: SELECT products.type FROM products GROUP BY products.type ORDER BY products.type ASC
list.name: type
list.query: SELECT products.type FROM products GROUP BY products.type ORDER BY products.type ASC
